articles.title: How Indiana's 23-point loss to Ohio State impacts Hoosiers' College Football Playoff chances - CBS Sports
articles.description: Indiana's postseason outlook took a slide after a blowout loss against the Buckeyes
articles.content: Indiana's special season ran into a brick wall Saturday afternoon as the fifth-ranked Hoosiers fell 38-15 on the road against No. 2 Ohio State. All week, questions about Indiana's legitimacy as a Big… [+3501 chars]
